mapper.insert: insert into GQPTZ_SWSJJ (GQPBH, GQPMC, SCSJ, YWDBS, DBSHSMJ, DXSLX, MS, BJFS, FSX, PHVALUE, YD) values (#{gqpbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gqpmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scsj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ywdbs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dbshsmj,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{dxslx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ms,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{bjfs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fsx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phvalue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yd,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update GQPTZ_SWSJJ set SCSJ = #{scsj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YWDBS = #{ywdbs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DBSHSMJ = #{dbshsmj,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, DXSLX = #{dxslx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MS = #{ms,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, BJFS = #{bjfs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FSX = #{fsx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PHVALUE = #{phvalue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YD = #{yd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where GQPBH = #{gqpbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and GQPMC = #{gqpmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select GQPBH, GQPMC, SCSJ, YWDBS, DBSHSMJ, DXSLX, MS, BJFS, FSX, PHVALUE, YD from GQPTZ_SWSJJ
